thread.title: Mackay's Lexie Barbart is a confessed touring addict
thread.title_full: Mackay's Lexie Barbart is a confessed touring addict

title: Mackay's Lexie Barbart is a confessed touring addict
text:
Mackay's Lexie Barbart is a confessed touring addict 20th Jul 2015 12:00 AM Lexie Barbart ... Her next American adventure will likely involve setting up somewhere deep in Central America. Related Items Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
No longer synonymous with mindlessly trailing after a tour guide, tours open up a world of experiences you may not be able to do on your own, including dining with local families. 
"I'm finding more and more people like to travel on their own - which is great - but for destinations like South America, it can be a little difficult to get around off the beaten track, which is why I always suggest touring," says Flight Centre Mackay's Lexie Barbart. 
Having completed a whirlwind 33-day Toucan tour of South America, Lexie ticked off many destinations on her travel list, including Iguazu Falls and Sugarloaf Mountain. 
Her next American adventure will likely involve setting up somewhere deep in Central America. 
"Sometime in my life I plan on living in Central America. I am obsessed with everything south of Mexico. I also want to do Canada one day to see the Northern Lights. 
"The Discover the Americas Travel Expo is coming up, which is always a fantastic time to book a holiday - especially when it comes to touring. 
"Tour operators will offer exclusive deals on the day, often on top of early-bird or repeat passenger discounts. 
"My pick is Intrepid; not only is it my favourite tour company, I had a customer last year save at least a thousand dollars on her loop around South America!" 
Discover the Americas Travel Expo exclusive deals will be available in store at your local Flight Centre on Saturday 25 and Sunday 26 July. 
Call Flight Centre for your next holiday on 1300 772 571. make-a-break-july-2015
